name: QUDO
description: QUDO is a Web3 gaming platform designed to support indie games by providing seamless blockchain integration and a shared economy for both developers and players. It enables Web2 games to adopt Web3 features in minutes, offering tools to help smaller studios bootstrap, optimize, and grow their games. At the core of the ecosystem is $QUDO, a universal credit system that rewards participation and engagement across all integrated games. Beyond tokens, QUDO introduces interoperable gaming assets, allowing players to own and use their items across multiple games that support the standard. By prioritizing accessibility and interoperability, QUDO creates a connected gaming experience where both developers and players benefit from a shared, decentralized ecosystem.
